history.content:
(for those still looking for more applications to file. I have a more complete flyer if anyone wants to look at it. Heather)

Greetings!

I'm a PhD student and Graduate Student Ambassador for the Electrical and Computer Engineering Program at the University of California, Santa Cruz.  We are still accepting applications to our PhD program until Jan 10 and for our Master's program until Feb 14.  We have terrific research groups in energy systems, robotics, cyber-physical systems, communications, and many more.  Additionally, we are located next to Silicon Valley which offers great internships and job opportunities to students as they complete their studies and build their professional networks.  
 I'm happy to connect with any students who may have questions about the program, research opportunities, student life, or the application process.  
Kind regards,  
Michael Powell
PhD Candidate
University of California - Santa Cruz
Computer Engineering
DANSER Lab
mopowell@ucsc.edu
www.linkedin.com/in/michael-ora-powell/
history.subject: MS and PhD Programs at UCSC Still Accepting Apps (and here's a contact!)
